resources.string: A place for those who Never Settle
Link device to claim the badge
Why am I not able to link my device?

Only OnePlus devices can be linked with your account. Other devices are not supported for linking. If you see \'Link Failed: Your device has been linked by xxx, please contact customer service for help.\' This means that your device has been activated with another account previously and some device benefits may have been claimed already. You can link another device that has not been activated with another account previously to claim benefits.
How can I claim my benefits?
Device benefits can only be claimed after your device is linked successfully. The device benefits can only be claimed once by one account.

You can earn RedCoins by purchasing selected products from oneplus.com or the OnePlus Store App.\n* Please note that not all products allow you to earn RedCoins. The availability of RedCoins depends on the specific campaign and the details of the information.
Plenty of official events and activities are also available for every Red Cable Club member to join for free and earn RedCoins!
RedCoins tasks will let you earn more RedCoins.
